TEXT.TITLE: USDA DISCUSSING PL 480 AGREEMENT WITH MOROCCO
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Agriculture Department is currently discussing an amendment to a PL 480 agreement signed with Morocco on January 22, but the mix of commodities under the amendment has not been determined, a U.S. Agriculture Department official said. The official noted the agreement signed in January provided for the supply of about 55,000 tonnes of vegetable oil, 55,000 tonnes of corn and 126,000 tonnes of wheat, all for delivery during the current fiscal year, ending this September 30. No purchase authorizations for the commodities provided in the January agreement have been announced by the department. Reuter
